column1: Smoque BBQ////My partner got the Pulled Pork Sandwich with a taste of the St. Louis Ribs
column2: both were reallyyy good. The only thing I would've like was more sauce on the Pulled Pork
column3: but it's personal preference really. I pretty much want everything on the menu
column4: so I will definitely be coming back to do just that. Yay Smoque!!
